titles: Lucans Pharsalia containing the ciuill warres betweene Cæsar and Pompey. Written in Latine heroicall verse by M. Annæus Lucanus. Translated into English verse by Sir Arthur Gorges Knight. Whereunto is annexed the life of the authour, collected out of diuers authors.
author: Lucan, 39-65.
Gorges, Arthur, Sir, 1557?-1625.
Gorges, Carew.
publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Edward Blount,
notes: One of three imprint variants of this edition.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
